profile.name: Talal Ahmad Saleemi
profile.title: HIPAA‑Certified Medical Billing / RCM Analyst (AR Specialist)
profile.about: Results‑driven RCM/AR specialist with end‑to‑end medical billing experience: AR follow‑ups, denial prevention and appeals, rejections, eligibility/benefits verification, and payment posting. Known for improving first‑pass acceptance and reducing AR days via clean‑claim workflows, analytics, and payer‑specific playbooks. HIPAA‑certified and focused on compliance and documentation quality.

bullets: Lead multi‑payer AR teams; prioritize inventory across 30/60/90/120+ buckets.
Implemented pre‑submission scrubs & payer‑specific edits to improve first‑pass acceptance.
Built dashboards for AR days, denial categories, zero‑pay trends, touch rate.
Uphold HIPAA and documentation quality; coached analysts on calls & notes.
Managed AR for multi‑specialty accounts; postings (ERA/EOB), rejections, re‑bills & appeals.
Performed eligibility & benefits verification to mitigate COB and coverage gaps.
Accelerated payer follow‑ups with scripts & templates for faster resolution.
Maintained high‑volume data accuracy, reporting, and process documentation.
